item.title: Horoscope Today, January 9, 2025: Check astrological prediction for Pisces, Leo and other signs - The Indian Express
item.description:
Horoscope Today, Jan 9, 2025: Pisces, Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Virgo, Leo and other signs ‚Äì Check astrological prediction

Date: January 9, 2025

Source: Astrological News

Today brings an emotional undertone, urging individuals to prioritize family over friends and focus on creating order amidst chaos.

  • Taurus: Patience is key; avoid conflicts over professional matters.
  • Gemini: Reflect on your financial situation; assess your affordability for future plans.
  • Cancer: Expect emotional ups and downs; manage misunderstandings carefully.
  • Leo: A mystery may arise; maintain humor amidst confusion.
  • Virgo: Use this time to reflect and assess your future role.
  • Libra: Appreciate current relationships; avoid unrealistic expectations.
  • Scorpio: Seek reciprocity in affection; ensure clear communication.
  • Sagittarius: Build trust in others; focus on practical matters.
  • Capricorn: Address emotional dilemmas related to family issues.
  • Aquarius: Share your plans openly for potential fresh starts.
  • Pisces: Embrace creativity; take informed risks on investments.

With varied emotional insights across signs, today emphasizes the importance of connection, trust, and reflection.

item.title: Los Angeles wildfire LIVE Updates: 5 dead, ‚ÄòSunset Fire‚Äô in Hollywood Hills grows to 50 acres, Biden cancels Italy trip | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Los Angeles wildfire LIVE Updates: 5 dead, ‚ÄòSunset Fire‚Äô in Hollywood Hills grows to 50 acres, Biden cancels Italy trip

Date: 09 Jan 2025 Source: LiveMint

Firefighters in Los Angeles are grappling with an out-of-control wildfire that has claimed five lives and forced a mass evacuation of 100,000 residents, including numerous celebrities.

  • The fire has destroyed multimillion-dollar homes and affected approximately 100,000 residents in the surrounding areas.
  • California Governor Gavin Newsom expressed gratitude for the efforts of firefighters managing the crisis.
  • President Joe Biden canceled his trip to Italy to focus on addressing the wildfires in California.
  • SpaceX is providing free Starlink terminals to areas affected by the fires, aiding communication for residents.
  • The Eaton Fire has grown to 10,600 acres, causing significant destruction and prompting widespread evacuations.
  • Authorities urged residents to stay indoors due to dangerous air quality caused by the smoke.
‚ÄúThe President‚Äôs action makes Federal funding available to affected individuals in Los Angeles County.‚Äù - White House Statement

This wildfire event highlights the ongoing challenges of wildfire management in California, compounded by extreme weather conditions.

item.title: Deva Trailer First Review: Shahid Kapoor's 'Power Packed' Trailer Is A Total 'Paisa Vasool'; DEETS - Filmibeat
item.description:
Deva Trailer First Review

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 Source: Filmibeat

Shahid Kapoor is back with an intense new avatar in his upcoming film 'Deva'. The recently released trailer has garnered much attention, showcasing high-octane action and Kapoor's compelling performance.

  • Shahid Kapoor stars as a fierce cop in 'Deva', directed by Rosshan Andrrews.
  • The teaser released on January 5, 2025, has already attracted 11 million views on YouTube.
  • 'Deva' promises to be an action-thriller and will release on January 31, 2025.
  • The film features Pooja Hegde opposite Shahid, along with other notable actors.
‚ÄúJust saw POWER PACKED & Paisa Vasool Final Cut Trailer of #Deva !!! #ShahidKapoor is BACKKKK with Bang üí•‚Äù - Umair Sandhu

With expectations high, Shahid Kapoor's 'Deva' is anticipated to be a blockbuster upon release.

item.title: After Guneet Monga, Priyanka Chopra joins Oscar-shortlisted short film Anuja as executive producer: ‚ÄòExtremely proud‚Äô - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra Joins Oscar-Shortlisted Film Anuja as Executive Producer

Date: Jan 09, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Global star Priyanka Chopra is extremely happy as she has come on board as an executive producer for the Oscar-shortlisted film Anuja. This film centers on a nine-year-old girl working in a garment factory who faces life-changing decisions.

  • Priyanka Chopra is proud to join the film Anuja as an executive producer.
  • The film is produced in collaboration with Salaam Baalak Trust, Shine Global, and Krushan Naik Films.
  • Guneet Monga, known for her Oscar-winning projects, is also a producer on Anuja.
  • Anuja depicts the struggles of children in tough circumstances, highlighting important social issues.
‚ÄúThis beautiful film shines a spotlight on a subject that affects millions of children around the world, who are faced with the impossible decision between a future they cannot yet see and the immediate realities of their present.‚Äù - Priyanka Chopra

Priyanka's involvement emphasizes her commitment to impactful storytelling in cinema, aiming to create awareness about significant social issues.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking (1 Day To Go): Sells 5 Lakh Tickets Already But Will Fail To Beat Guntur Kaaram - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking (1 Day To Go)

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

The countdown is set to end as we‚Äôre just one day away from Ram Charan‚Äôs Game Changer. The advance booking response, however, is underwhelming compared to expectations.

  • The film has sold over 5 lakh tickets for day 1.
  • Advance booking gross stands at 14.83 crore.
  • Andhra Pradesh leads in ticket sales, followed by Telangana and Karnataka.
  • High expectations were set due to the collaboration of Shankar and Ram Charan, but responses have been muted.
  • The film is expected to hit around 20 crore by end of day, but comparisons to Mahesh Babu‚Äôs Guntur Kaaram reveal that it may fall short.
‚ÄúFrom here, it will definitely fail to beat Mahesh Babu‚Äôs Guntur Kaaram, which sold tickets worth 24.90 crore gross at the Indian box office for day 1.‚Äù

Overall, while the advance booking numbers are decent, they fall short of the major expectations set for this blockbuster film.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut says it was a mistake directing Emergency, choosing theatrical release: 'Thought I'd be able to get away' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut Reflects on Mistakes in Directing Emergency

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Kangana Ranaut shares her thoughts on the delays and challenges surrounding her directorial debut, Emergency, revealing her regrets over certain decisions.

  • The film is set to release in theaters on January 17 after facing delays due to certification issues.
  • Kangana expressed her fear over the CBFC's refusal to certify the film for months.
  • She regretted choosing a theatrical release, believing it would have been better suited for OTT platforms.
  • The film stars Kangana as Indira Gandhi and addresses significant historical events.
‚ÄúI felt that it was a wrong decision to release it in theatres. I thought I could have gotten a better deal on OTT.‚Äù - Kangana Ranaut

Ultimately, Kangana reflects on the challenges of filmmaking and the complexities of addressing historical narratives.

item.title: Paris Hilton 'heartbroken' as she watches her Malibu home burn on live TV - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Paris Hilton 'heartbroken' as she watches her Malibu home burn on live TV

Date: January 09, 2025 / 09:14 IST Source: Moneycontrol

Paris Hilton was heartbroken as she shared video of her family home in Malibu being completely destroyed in the Los Angeles wildfires.

  • Hilton shared an emotional Instagram post about the loss.
  • She expressed that she was 'heartbroken beyond words' over the incident.
  • Her home was a place filled with precious memories, including significant moments with her family.
"Heartbroken beyond words. Sitting with my family, watching the news, and seeing our home in Malibu burn to the ground on live TV is something no one should ever have to experience. This home was where we built so many precious memories. It‚Äôs where Phoenix took his first steps and where we dreamed of building a lifetime of memories with London."

This tragic event highlights the devastating impact of wildfires on individuals and families, showcasing the emotional toll it takes to lose a cherished home.

item.title: Rs 250 Cr Gamble in Telugu States for Pongal.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Rs 250 Cr Gamble in Telugu States for Pongal

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Great Andhra

The Telugu film industry is optimistic as three major films are releasing around the Sankranthi festival, collectively generating close to ‚Çπ250 crore in pre-release business.

  • The films include ‚ÄúGame Changer,‚Äù ‚ÄúDaaku Maharaaj,‚Äù and ‚ÄúSankranthiki Vasthunnam.‚Äù
  • ‚ÄúGame Changer‚Äù accounts for ‚Çπ130 crore of the pre-release earnings alone.
  • ‚ÄúDaaku Maharaaj‚Äù and ‚ÄúSankranthiki Vasthunnam‚Äù contribute over ‚Çπ100 crore combined.
  • All three films aim to recover massive investments during the festival season.
  • Positive reviews are crucial for the films to succeed in recouping investments.
  • The Venkatesh starrer is expected to recover its cost more easily than others.
‚ÄúIf the films receive positive reviews, recovering these amounts won‚Äôt be challenging.‚Äù

In conclusion, the success of these films during the Sankranthi festival is pivotal for the Telugu film industry.

item.title: Pushpa 2: The Rule box office collection Day 35: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer maintaines stea - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2: The Rule Box Office Collection on Day 35

Publication Date: Date Not Provided Source: Times of India

Pushpa 2, featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to perform steadily at the box office, approaching the Rs 25 crore mark by the end of its fifth week.

item.title: Who is Geetu Mohandas? Former actor, director of Yash's upcoming action-thriller Toxic - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Who is Geetu Mohandas? Former actor, director of Yash's upcoming action-thriller Toxic

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

On the occasion of Kannada superstar Yash's birthday, fans received a special treat as the makers of his upcoming film, Toxic, unveiled an intriguing teaser. The teaser showcased Yash in a dashing avatar, bringing attention to the film's director, Geetu Mohandas.

Key Points:

  • Geetu Mohandas, born Gayathri Mohandas, is a former child actor turned director.
  • Her film career began at a young age and she won several awards for her performances.
  • She debuted as a director with the acclaimed short film Kelkkunnundo.
  • Her feature film Liar‚Äôs Dice was India‚Äôs official entry to the Oscars.
  • Her latest film, Toxic, stars Yash and is set for release later this year.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

‚ÄúGeetu ventured into direction with her short fiction film Kelkkunnundo... It became so influential that it was included as part of the Kerala state syllabus for 12th-grade students in 2014.‚Äù

Geetu Mohandas‚Äôs journey from child star to acclaimed filmmaker illustrates her evolution and significant contributions to Indian cinema.

item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025 predicts success in your academics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025

Date: January 09, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope for Pisces indicates a productive day ahead, especially for students who are likely to experience success in their academic pursuits.

  • Students will have a successful academic life.
  • Financial caution is advised regarding investments and loans.
  • Health remains stable, but attention to mental well-being is recommended.
  • Positive career opportunities for professionals in IT, healthcare, and more.
  • Relationship dynamics are favorable, with potential romantic developments.
No major relationship issues will create turbulence. Today is auspicious to introduce the lover to the family.

In conclusion, today offers promising opportunities for Pisces in both personal and academic aspects, urging them to stay proactive.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025 predicts financial windfall - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025

Date: January 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The daily horoscope for Aquarius advises caution in spending on luxury items and outlines a day of financial opportunities alongside a need for strong interpersonal communication.

  • Strong attitude at work will help handle crucial tasks efficiently.
  • Commitment in love affairs is emphasized; open communication is important.
  • Money will be received from various sources, with a recommendation to avoid unnecessary expenses.
  • Health remains stable with minor issues advised to be managed carefully.
  • Creative professionals may see new opportunities and entrepreneurs should consider expanding their ventures.
‚ÄúDo not spend a big amount on luxury.‚Äù

Overall, today presents favorable conditions for Aquarius individuals in both career and relationships, asserting the importance of communication and financial prudence.

item.title: Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025 predicts professional triumph - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025 predicts professional triumph

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Capricorn Daily Horoscope for today suggests a strong focus on professional performance and relationships. Married females may also conceive today, indicating positive personal developments.

  • Be confident about your professional achievements and handle wealth diligently.
  • Avoid office politics and conspiracies that may affect your career.
  • Refresh your financial planning, making smart investments and careful expenditures.
  • Health remains mostly stable but attention to minor ailments is necessary.
  • Love life is vibrant; ensure to communicate and support each other.
‚ÄúYour commitment to the relationship will have positive results.‚Äù

In conclusion, today's horoscope emphasizes the importance of confidence in professional and personal spheres, urging Capricorns to manage their affairs wisely.

item.title: Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, January 9, 2025 predicts a positive shift - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025 to know your astrological predictions.

item.title: Libra Daily Horoscope Today, January 09, 2025 predicts marriage is on the cards - Hindustan Times
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Salim Khan Says Salman Khan Wants Wife To Give Up Career, Stay Home: 'Convert Karne Ki Koshish...' | Viral - News18
item.description:
Salim Khan Says Salman Khan Wants Wife To Give Up Career, Stay Home: 'Convert Karne Ki Koshish...'

Date: January 08, 2025 Source: Viral

Salim Khan discusses Salman Khan's approach to relationships and marriage, revealing insights into the actor's expectations from his partners.

  • Salman Khan, a prominent figure in Bollywood, remains unmarried despite several high-profile relationships.
  • Salim Khan attributes Salman‚Äôs single status to his contradictory thinking regarding marriage.
  • He expressed that after committing to a partner, Salman looks for maternal qualities in them.
  • Salim criticized Salman‚Äôs expectation that career-oriented women should abandon their ambitions for household duties.
  • A recent clip of this discussion went viral, reigniting public interest in Salman‚Äôs love life.
‚ÄúAfter commitment, he tries to convert them and looks for his mother in them. That is not possible.‚Äù - Salim Khan

This conversation sheds light on the complexities of Salman Khan's personal life and challenges traditional expectations in relationships.

item.title: Nagarjuna Akkineni reveals his fitness mantra for a strong physique at 65: 'I finish my dinner by 7 pm or - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Nagarjuna Akkineni reveals his fitness mantra for a strong physique at 65

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Not specified

Nagarjuna Akkineni shares his approach to maintaining fitness and health at the age of 65, emphasizing the importance of timing in meals.

  • Nagarjuna concludes his dinner by 7 PM or 7:30 PM, which he considers crucial for his fitness.
  • He highlights the need for discipline in diet and lifestyle choices to uphold physical health.
  • Despite his age, he continues to keep a strong physique and lead an active lifestyle.
"I finish my dinner by 7 pm or 7:30 pm at the latest."

His discipline in maintaining a healthy lifestyle serves as an inspiration, showcasing that age should not limit one's commitment to fitness.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Eisha Singh Sees This Contestant In Finale And It Is Not Vivian Dsena Or Avinash Mishra - News18
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Eisha Singh Sees This Contestant In Finale And It Is Not Vivian Dsena Or Avinash Mishra

Last Updated: January 08, 2025, 16:20 IST

Bigg Boss 18, hosted by Salman Khan, is preparing for its upcoming grand finale on January 19. Contestant Eisha Singh has caused a stir by implying that she does not see popular contestants Avinash Mishra or Vivian Dsena making it to the finale.

  • Eisha Singh reveals her predicted contestant for the finale.
  • The episode showcased intense competition among contestants during a nomination task.
  • Other contestants include Karan Veer Mehra, Rajat Dalal, Shrutika Arjun, Chahat Pandey, Chum Darang, and Shilpa Shirodkar.
  • Kashish Kapoor was recently eliminated after receiving the fewest votes.
‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want to give clarity to you.‚Äù ‚Äì Vivian Dsena

The anticipation builds as fans eagerly await the finale to see who will take the Bigg Boss 18 title.

item.title: Film producer, journalist, poet Pritish Nandy passes away at 73 - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Pritish Nandy, Renowned Film Producer and Poet, Dies at 73

Date: Today
Source: Bollywood Hungama

Pritish Nandy, an eminent journalist, poet, writer, and film producer, has passed away in Mumbai at the age of 73, with the news confirmed by his son, filmmaker Kushan Nandy.

  • Nandy was known for producing notable films such as Kuch Khatti Kuch Meethi, Kaante, Jhankaar Beats, and Hazaaron Khwaishein Aisi.
  • In recent years, he ventured into web series, creating popular shows like Four More Shots Please and Modern Love Mumbai.
  • Veteran actor Anupam Kher expressed deep sadness over Nandy's demise, sharing a heartfelt message and memories of their friendship.
‚ÄúDeeply deeply saddened and shocked to know about the demise of one of my dearest and closest friends #PritishNandy! Amazing poet, writer, filmmaker‚Ä¶‚Äù - Anupam Kher

Nandy‚Äôs passing marks a significant loss in the Indian film and literary community, reflecting his impact over decades as a creative force.

item.title: 'Wicked,' 'A Complete Unknown' lead Hollywood's SAG award nominees - Hindustan Times
item.description:
'Wicked,' 'A Complete Unknown' Lead Hollywood's SAG Award Nominees

Date: Jan 08, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

LOS ANGELES - Box office smash "Wicked," the musical prequel to "The Wizard of Oz," topped the list of film nominees unveiled for Hollywood's Screen Actors Guild Awards, a key indicator of support for movies heading into the Academy Awards.

  • "Wicked" earned five nominations, leading ahead of four for Bob Dylan biopic "A Complete Unknown."
  • Both films are nominated for the SAG honor of best movie cast, competing with other titles such as "Emilia Perez" and "Conclave."
  • Nominated actors from "Wicked" include Ariana Grande, Cynthia Erivo, and Jonathan Bailey.
  • Winners of the SAG awards will be announced on Feb. 23, with the ceremony streaming live on Netflix.
"The SAG awards are closely watched because they are selected by members of the SAG-AFTRA actors union and actors form the largest group of voters for the Oscars."

This year's SAG award nominations reflect a diverse range of performances and notable productions, signaling strong contenders leading into the Academy Awards.

item.title: Harshdeep Kaur reveals Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli see god in each other as she recalls making their w - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Harshdeep Kaur reveals Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli see god in each other as she recalls making their wedding song ‚ÄòPeer Vi Tu‚Äô

Publication Date: Not Available | Source: Not Available

In a recent interview, singer Harshdeep Kaur reflects on her experience creating the wedding song 'Peer Vi Tu' for the Bollywood couple Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli, praising their deep bond.

  • Harshdeep Kaur shared behind-the-scenes insights from recording the song.
  • The song 'Peer Vi Tu' holds special significance for the couple.
  • Kaur noted that Sharma and Kohli have a spiritual connection in their relationship.
‚ÄúAnushka and Virat see god in each other,‚Äù said Kaur, highlighting their unique relationship.

This reflection not only showcases Kaur's artistry but also offers a glimpse into the personal life of one of Bollywood's most celebrated couples.

item.title: Manoj Bajpayee reveals he felt guilty going to 5-star hotels after Satya‚Äôs success; says Akshaye Khanna knocked some sense into him - The Indian Express
item.description:
Manoj Bajpayee reveals he felt guilty going to 5-star hotels after Satya‚Äôs success; says Akshaye Khanna knocked some sense into him

Date: January 8, 2025 Source: The Indian Express

In a recent discussion, Manoj Bajpayee shared his struggles with fame following the success of the film Satya, highlighting how Akshaye Khanna played a key role in helping him come to terms with his achievements.

  • Manoj Bajpayee, an outsider in Bollywood, achieved significant fame through Satya.
  • He initially felt guilty about his success and struggled with impostor syndrome.
  • Akshaye Khanna encouraged him to accept and own his success.
  • Bajpayee expressed his discomfort with sudden attention and fame after years of minor roles.
  • In 2024, he had multiple releases, including projects on OTT platforms.
‚ÄúIt was Akshaye Khanna who said, ‚ÄòManoj, why are you feeling so guilty about your success? Own it.‚Äô‚Äù

Ultimately, Bajpayee's story serves as an inspiration, showcasing the complex emotions tied to fame and the importance of supportive relationships in overcoming personal challenges.

item.title: Telangana government approves ticket price hike for Ram Charan‚Äôs ‚ÄòGame Changer‚Äô - Telangana Today
item.description:
Telangana government approves ticket price hike for Ram Charan's 'Game Changer'

Updated On - 8 January 2025, 10:16 PM | Source: Telangana Today

The Telangana government has permitted a ticket price hike for the Ram Charan-starrer Game Changer, set for release on January 10. The decision follows a meeting between film producer Dil Raju and Chief Minister A Revanth Reddy.

  • Approval for ticket price hike for 'Game Changer' and 'Sankranthiki Vasthunnam'.
  • Additional screenings allowed, including six shows on January 10.
  • Price hikes: Rs 150 extra at multiplexes, Rs 100 at single-screen theatres from January 10.
  • Earlier ban on hikes after a tragic incident at Sandhya Theatre has been reversed.
  • The hike is anticipated to benefit Telugu filmmakers facing high production costs.
The Telangana government‚Äôs decision to approve the hike of ticket prices for Game Changer will surely bring huge relief to Telugu filmmakers whose production costs and film budgets run into crores.

This change marks a significant shift in government policy after previously prohibiting such price hikes.
